Description
More than 55 filters and the posibility of modificate all of them, by your choice.

U-point Technology (selecting areas based processing chromatic circles) for a more detailed process.

Eight new filters and over ten updates in existing on version 3


More info on http://www.niksoftware.com/colorefexpro

Instructions:
Use the DMG and install normally

Extract the .zip

Photoshop: replace the file .plugin (that you will fin on Applications > Photoshop > Plug ins > Nik software > Color Efex Pro 4) with the included in the .zip


Lightroom: replace \\\\\\\'Color Efex Pro 4.app\\\\\\\' on folder Applications > Nik software with the included in the .zip

Aperture: replace the file \\\\\\\'Color Efex Pro 4.ApertureEdit\\\\\\\' on Library > Application Support > Aperture > Plug-Ins > Nik Software > Color Efex Pro 4 with the included in the .zip
